item.title: RSA加解密🔒
item.description: 生成RSA公私钥 代码 class RsaHandler { /** * 过期时间 * @var int|mixed */ protected $expire; /** * 密钥密码 * @var string */ protected $pass_phrase; /** * 密钥保存路径 * @var string */ protected $path; /** * 私钥 * @var string */ protected $private_key; /** * 时间戳 * @var integer */ protected $time; /** * 基础配置 * @var string[] */ public $dn = [ "countryName" => "CN", "stateOrProvinceName" => "ChongQing", "localityName" => "China", "organizationName" => "The Brain Room Limited", "organizationalUnitName" => "PHP Documentation Team", "commonName" => "Rancy Bruce", "emailAddress" => "rancy@rancy.
